name: Spell Penetration
text: Your spells break through spell resistance more easily than most.
benefit: You get a +2 bonus on caster level checks (1d20 + caster level) made to overcome a creature's spell resistance.
mythicText: Your mythic power breaches your enemies’ defenses.
mythicBenefit: Add half your tier to caster level checks to overcome spell resistance. If you have Greater Spell Penetration, add your full tier instead.
text_zh: 你的法术比大多数的法术更容易穿透法术抗力。
benefit_zh: 你在克服生物法术抗力的施法者等级检定（1d20+CL）上获得+2加值。
mythicText_zh: 你的神话之力能够粉碎敌人的防御。
mythicBenefit_zh: 将你的阶层的一半加到用于克服法术抗力的施法者等级检定中。若你具有高等法术穿透专长，则使用你的阶层取代阶层的一半。
